solution_line_template: The dolphins are fed {sharks_fed_buckets}/{dolphins_divisor} = <<{sharks_fed_buckets}/{dolphins_divisor}={dolphins_fed_buckets}>>{dolphins_fed_buckets} buckets of fish each day.

The sea animals are fed {sharks_fed_buckets} x {sea_animals_multiplier} = <<{sharks_fed_buckets}*{sea_animals_multiplier}={sea_animals_fed_buckets}>>{sea_animals_fed_buckets} buckets of fish each day.

So, the Mystic Aquarium needs {sharks_fed_buckets} + {dolphins_fed_buckets} + {sea_animals_fed_buckets} = <<{sharks_fed_buckets}+{dolphins_fed_buckets}+{sea_animals_fed_buckets}={total_daily_buckets}>>{total_daily_buckets} buckets of fish each day.
Thus in a week, it needs {total_daily_buckets} x {days_per_week} = <<{total_daily_buckets}*{days_per_week}={total_weekly_buckets}>>{total_weekly_buckets} buckets of fish.

Therefore, {total_available_buckets} buckets of fish will last for {total_available_buckets}/{total_weekly_buckets} = <<{total_available_buckets}/{total_weekly_buckets}={weeks_last}>>{weeks_last} weeks.
